title: "Equation Wallpapers"
content:
ðŸ‘‹ Welcome to our website! Here you can find a collection of sleek and modern wallpapers featuring simple equations and formulas. Our minimalist designs are perfect for anyone who loves math or wants to add a touch of sophistication to their device's background. 

Our wallpapers are carefully crafted to be both aesthetically pleasing and functional. The repeating patterns of equations and formulas create a unique texture that is sure to catch the eye, while the simplicity of the design ensures that it won't distract from your icons or widgets.

Whether you're a student, a teacher, or just someone who appreciates the beauty of mathematics, we have a wallpaper that's perfect for you. Browse our collection today and find the perfect equation wallpaper to elevate your device's style!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper featuring a repeating pattern of simple equations and formulas, arranged in a minimalist and modern design."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not repeat the title of the website.
- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
